pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inference, Aggregation and Visualization for Top-K Ranked Lists // For multiple ranked input lists (full or partial) representing the same set of N objects, the package TopKLists offers (1) statistical inference on the lengths of informative top-k lists, (2) stochastic aggregation of full or partial lists, and (3) graphical tools for the statistical exploration of input lists, and for the visualization of aggregation results.
